string.value: Through research, you discovered that a place known as the Mushroom Castle is in trouble, but even #bThe Rememberer#k doesn't know anything about the place. You should see what he thinks you should do next.

Through research, you discovered that a place known as the Mushroom Castle is in trouble, but even #bThe Rememberer#k had no clue where that is. He recommends you ask #bKarcasa#k in the desert for some information…
You met #bKarcasa#k and asked about the Mushroom Castle, to no avail.
Okay, I think I know what to do now. I'll send you to #bKarcasa#k right now. The only problem is that he's…quite the salesman. You'll know what I mean. Do you want to go over to see him right now?
Alright, now head over to see #bKarcasa#k and ask him about Mushroom Castle. Again, thank you for helping me out with my research!
Hmmm… I don't know if I've told you this, but at your level, it might be easier to level-up around the desert. It's your choice, though…
Eh? Who are you? I don't think we've ever met.
Haven't you gone to see #bKarcasa#k at the desert yet?
